text: If there's anything more important than my ego around, I want it caught and shot now
author: Douglas Adams

text: I’m just sick of ego, ego, ego. My own and everybody else’s. I’m sick of everybody that wants to get somewhere, do something distinguished and all, be somebody interesting. It’s disgusting
author: J.D. Salinger

text: Don’t sacrifice yourself too much, because if you sacrifice too much there’s nothing else you can give and nobody will care for yo
author: Karl Lagerfeld

text: If being an egomaniac means I believe in what I do and in my art or music, then in that respect you can call me that... I believe in what I do, and I'll say it
author: John Lennon

text: Make your ego porous. Will is of little importance, complaining is nothing, fame is nothing. Openness, patience, receptivity, solitude is everything
author: Rainer Maria Rilke

text: The problem with introspection is that it has no end
author: Philip K. Dick

text: The human mind has a primitive ego defense mechanism that negates all realities that produce too much stress for the brain to handle. It’s called Denial
author: Dan Brown

text: The ego hurts you like this: you become obsessed with the one person who does not love you. blind to the rest who do
author: Warsan Shire

text: Worry pretends to be necessary but serves no useful purpose
author: Eckhart Tolle

text: Sure. My ego's had enough time to recover a modicum of dignity. Let's make sure we crush it again before I mistake myself for a god. -Acheron
author: Sherrilyn Kenyon

text: Part of me suspects that I'm a loser, and the other part of me thinks I'm God Almighty
author: John Lennon

text: I would prefer not to
author: Herman Melville

text: Whenever I climb I am followed by a dog called 'Ego'
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

text: There are two circumstances that lead to arrogance: one is when you're wrong and you can't face it; the other is when you're right and nobody else can face it
author: Criss Jami

text: The first half of life is devoted to forming a healthy ego, the second half is going inward and letting go of it
author: Carl Jung

text: Help me, I can’t breathe, your ego is pushing all the air out of the room
author: Ilona Andrews

text: Enlightenment is ego's ultimate disappointment
author: Chögyam Trungpa

text: You never really learn much from hearing yourself speak
author: George Clooney

text: If a man thinks he is not conceited, he is very conceited indeed
author: C.S. Lewis

text: I am sufficiently proud of my knowing something to be modest about my not knowing all
author: Vladimir Nabokov

text: In this story, I am the poet, You're the poetry
author: Arzum Uzun

text: A bad day for your ego is a great day for your soul
author: Jillian Michaels

text: Love starts when we push aside our ego and make room for someone else
author: Rudolf Steiner

text: I just noticed a lack of ego in the room and thought ‘hey, where’s Braden?
author: Samantha Young

text: Writer’s block is only a failure of the ego
author: Norman Mailer

text: Or, rather, let us be more simple and less vain
author: Rousseau Jean-Jacques

text: We don't need giant personalities to transform companies. We need leaders who build not their own egos but the institutions they run
author: Susan Cain

text: The opposite of love is not hate. It is indifference
author: Wilhelm Stekel

text: The Ego is a veil between humans and God
author: Rumi

text: The weak are dominated by their ego, the wise dominate their ego, and the intelligent are in a constant struggle against their ego
author: Hamza Yusuf

text: In prayer all are equal
author: Rumi

text: The ego relies on the familiar. It is reluctant to experience the unknown, which is they very essence of life
author: Deepak Chopra

text: I don't know about your true form, but the weight of your ego sure is pushing the crust of the earth toward the breaking point
author: Jim Butcher

text: Midlife is the time to let go of an overdominant ego and to contemplate the deeper significance of human existence
author: Carl Gustav Jung

text: Show me someone without an ego, and I'll show you a loser
author: Donald Trump

text: No matter what we talk about, we are talking about ourselves
author: Hugh Prather

text: The real opposition is that between the ego-bound man, whose existence is structured by the principle of having, and the free man, who has overcome his egocentricity
author: Erich Fromm

text: Forget the self and you will fear nothing, in whatever level or awareness you find yourself to be
author: Carlos Castaneda

text: Impressing people is utterly different from being truly impressive
author: Ryan Holiday

text: In the light of our egos, we are all dethroned monarchs
author: Charlie Chaplin

text: Do you ever lose the ego?  Westford asks me Yeah,  When his daughter kisses me, my ego flies out the window
author: Simone Elkeles

text: Wear your ego like a loose fitting garment
author: Buddha

text: Life is a compromise of what your ego wants to do, what experience tells you to do, and what your nerves let you do
author: Walter Bagehot

text: Where id is, there shall ego be
author: Sigmund Freud

text: This is God's universe, buddy, not yours, and he has the final say about what's ego and what isn't
author: J.D. Salinger

text: I am an ant in the battlefield of the gods. There's no room for pride or ego, and barely enough room for survival
author: Susan Ee

text: She was a wicked thing sometimes. All full of want. As if the shape of the world depended on her mood. As if she were important
author: Patrick Rothfuss

text: Leave your pride, ego, and narcissism somewhere else. Reactions from those parts of you will reinforce your children's most primitive fears
author: Dr. Henry Cloud & Dr. John Townsend

text: If someone corrects you, and you feel offended, then you have an ego problem
author: Nouman Ali Khan

text: The brightest light casts the darkest shadow
author: Jess C. Scott

text: Hey, you created me! I didn't create some loser alter-ego to make myself feel better. Take some responsibility!
author: Chuck Palahniuk

text: It's very different because the Indians live as if they are their souls and Americans live as if they are their egos
author: Ram dass

text: I need a Caution: Slippery When Wet sign, because I just spilled my ego all over the floor
author: Jarod Kintz

text: In the eyes of the ego, self-esteem and humility are contradictory. In truth, they are one and the same
author: Eckhart Tolle

text: The ego hates losing – even to God
author: Richard Rohr

text: It is far more common for people to allow ego to stand in the way of learning
author: Ray Dalio

text: Great people have great egos; maybe that's what makes them great
author: Paul Arden

text: A man's ego is the fountainhead of human progress
author: Ayn Rand

text: Never allow your ego to diminish your ability to listen
author: Gary Hopkins

text: Most successful people are people you’ve never heard of. They want it that way. It keeps them sober. It helps them do their jobs
author: Ryan Holiday

text: I bet it gets pretty lonely with only your ego for company
author: Alexandra Bracken

text: I find that the sensation of myself as an ego inside a bag of skin is really a hallucination
author: Alan Watts

text: Humility is, in a sense, admitting how egotistical you are
author: Criss Jami

text: The square root of I is I
author: Vladimir Nabokov

text: The greatest win is walking away and choosing not to engage in drama and toxic energy at all
author: Lalah Delia

text: The Ego is an exquisite instrument. Enjoy it, use it--just don't get lost in it
author: Ram dass

text: His dinner included three hamburgers and two orders of fries. I had no idea where those calories went. To his ego, maybe?
author: Jennifer L. Armentrout

text: If we are to grow in love, the prisons of our egoism must be unlocked. This implies suffering, constant effort and repeated choices
author: Jean Vanier

text: When I pass, speak freely of my shortcomings and my flaws. Learn from them, for I'll have no ego to injure
author: Aaron McGruder

text: Nobody who's really using his ego, his real ego, has any time for any goddam hobbies
author: J.D. Salinger

text: Busted. I'm a monster. Jev is my deceptively harmless-and shockingly handsome-alter ego
author: Becca Fitzpatrick

text: If you think you're smart, think twice to be smarter
author: Toba Beta

text: I like the moment when I break a man's ego
author: Bobby Fischer

text: We can't all be stars because someone has to sit on the curb and clap as I go by
author: Sebastian Horsley

text: All things are Nothing to Me
author: Max Stirner

text: Nice words and nice appearance doesn't conclude that someone is nice, i believe that the nicer you look, the more deceptive you appear
author: Michael Bassey Johnson

text: Don't feed your ego with my soul
author: Arzum Uzun

text: The minute you start compromising for the sake of massaging somebody's ego, that's it, game over
author: Gordon Ramsay

text: Social media has infected the world with a sickening virus called vanity
author: Kellie Elmore

text: When ego is lost, limit is lost. You become infinite, kind, beautiful
author: Yogi Bhajan

text: The secret to a happiness is a small ego. And a big wallet. Good wine helps, too. But that's not really a secret, is it?
author: Robert Louis Stevenson

text: An exceedingly confident student would in theory make a terrible student. Why would he take school seriously when he feels that he can outwit his teachers?
author: Criss Jami

text: Male egos require constant stroking. Every task is an achievement, every success epic. That is why women cook, but men are chefs: we make cheese on toast, they produce pain de fromage
author: Belle de Jour

text: My ego doesn't need soothing. I don't want him soothing anything of mine, including you
author: Ilona Andrews

text: There is nothing more important to true growth than realizing that you are not the voice of the mind - you are the one who hears it
author: Michael A. Singer

text: In mourning it is the world which has become poor and empty; in melancholia it is the ego itself
author: Sigmund Freud

text: The pretense of knowledge is our most dangerous vice, because it prevents us from getting any better
author: Ryan Holiday

text: The worst disease which can afflict executives in their work is not, as popularly supposed, alcoholism; it's egotism
author: Robert Frost

text: I believe that when I die I shall rot, and nothing of my ego will survive
author: Bertrand Russell

text: The image that concerns most people is the reflection they see in other people's minds
author: Edward De Bono

text: A man who loves others based solely on how they make him feel, or what they do for him, is really not loving others at all - but loving only himself
author: Criss Jami

text: The Divine Light is always in man, presenting itself to the senses and to the comprehension, but man rejects it
author: Giordano Bruno

text: Greatness comes from humble beginnings; it comes from grunt work. It means you’re the least important person in the room—until you change that with results
author: Ryan Holiday

text: You know, I honestly can’t decide if your ego is repulsive or just impressive
author: Kylie Scott

text: To write requires an ego, a belief that what you say matters. Writing also requires an aching curiosity leading you to discover, uncover, what is gnawing at your bones
author: Terry Tempest Williams

text: It is a truth universally acknowledged that a single man in possession of a large ego must be in want of a woman to cut him down to size
author: Melissa Nathan

text: Thinking can only serve to measure out the helplessness of thought
author: H. Rider Haggard

text: You’re not as good as you think. You don’t have it all figured out. Stay focused. Do better
author: Ryan Holiday

text: The only one everlasting love is the unrealized one. The love to this thing that you’d never had. Behind it is hidden the love to your own ego and feelings
author: Alexandar Tomov

text: His kisses really did have the power to change lives. Not that I'd admit that. His ego was ginormous as it was
author: Jennifer L. Armentrout

text: Avoid having your ego so close to your position that when your position falls, your ego goes with it
author: Colin Powell

text: Mental face palm. Suddenly I wasn't sure there was enough room on the campus for both me and his ego
author: Gemma Halliday

text: All liars ... lie to protect themselves, to shield their egos from the raw pain of truth
author: Aminatta Forna

text: Stay out of the court of self-judgment, for there is no presumption of innocence
author: Robert Brault

text: A religion, even if it calls itself a religion of love, must be hard and unloving to those who do not belong to it
author: Sigmund Freud

text: Sink into morbid, cynical reflection on how much romantic heartbreak is to do with ego and miffed pride rather than actual loss
author: Helen Fielding

text: My power is my property. My power gives me property. My power am I myself, and through it am I my property
author: Max Stirner

text: And they can’t understand, what hurts more— Missing the other person, or pretending not to
author: Khadija Rupa

text: Literature is humanity's broad-minded alter-ego, with room in its heart for monsters, even for you. It's humanity without the judgement
author: Glen Duncan

text: How odd, to suddenly glimpse a facet of me I didn't know existed. I guess it really isn't all that unusual to surprise oneself with an ugly bit of ego
author: Ellen Hopkins

text: People love answers, but only as long as they are the ones who came up with them
author: Criss Jami

text: Writing is an act of ego, and you might as well admit it
author: William Zinsser

text: The human mind has a primitive ego defince mechanism that negates all realities that produce too much stress for the brain to handle. It's called denial
author: Dan Brown

text: There's magic in recognizing a kindred spirit, and an even greater power in letting yourself love them. When it scares you, let it - that's your ego letting go
author: Jacqueline Koyanagi

text: Peace becomes a fantasy when egos are promoted and facts distorted
author: Duop Chak Wuol

text: People learn from their failures. Seldom do they learn anything from success
author: Ryan Holiday

text: Resistance is weakness and fear masquerading as strength. What the ego sees as weakness is your Being in its purity, innocence, and power. What it sees as strength is weakness
author: Eckhart Tolle

text: Don't worry, now that I know about your little ego problem, I'll do my best to look all gushy when you pound your chest
author: Christine Feehan

text: Please, not again what you studied, how long you spent at it, how many books you wrote, what people thought of you - but: what did you learn?
author: Idries Shah

text: Act as if you don't know me, and i will make it seem as though you don't exist
author: Michael Bassey Johnson

text: Why don't you put your ego down for a while, Justin. It must be getting heavy
author: Nora Roberts

text: It’s in the act of having to do things that you don’t want to that you learn something about moving past the self. Past the ego
author: Bell hooks

text: Marriage is not a simple love affair, it’s an ordeal, and the ordeal is the sacrifice of ego to a relationship in which two have become one
author: Joseph Campbell

text: When each expects the other to live in his or her world, to always be there to join in his or her chosen activities, an ego battle inevitably develops
author: James Redfield

text: A man's alter ego is nothing more than his favorite image of himself
author: Stan Redding

text: I was trapped so terribly inside my own head that I was a prisoner to my own thoughts
author: Ryan Holiday

text: U can feed ur ego or u can feed ur family. U can’t feed them both
author: Zig Ziglar

text: Bless people when they revile you. Think how much good they are doing by helping to stamp out the false ego
author: Swami Vivekananda

text: Man, that did his ego good. Matter of fact, she hit him with anything like that again, he was going to feel like he could bench-press a city bus. With a jet plane on its roof
author: J.R. Ward

text: Self-consciousness of the manner is the expensive substitute for simplicity
author: George Eliot

text: No matter what the practice or teaching, ego loves to wait in ambush to appropriate spirituality for its own survival and gain
author: Chögyam Trungpa

text: Silence. The ability to deliberately keep yourself out of the conversation and subsist without its validation. Silence is the respite of the confident and the strong
author: Ryan Holiday

text: It was beyond embarrassing or humiliating or even mortifying. It was ego-slaying!
author: Wendelin Van Draanen

text: Nobody sees anybody truly but all through the flaws of their own egos. That is the way we all see each other in life
author: Tennessee Williams

text: An average man is egoistic, proud and has strong self esteem. They always require partners who massage their ego not those who will drag their ego to the mud
author: Agu Jaachynma N.E.

text: We are all one. Only egos, beliefs, and fears separate us
author: Nikola Tesla

text: A conscious human is driven by their conscience, not popular opinion
author: Suzy Kassem

text: Anger gets you into trouble, ego keeps you in trouble
author: Amit Kalantri

text: Love is a spiritual phenomenon; lust is physical. Ego is psychological; love is spiritual
author: Osho

text: You want to become more open-minded, challenge your ideas without being offended. Don’t let your ego ruin your learning experience
author: Pooja Agnihotri

text: Accept the long night patiently, quietly, humbly, and resignedly as intended for your true good. It is not a punishment for sin committed but an instrument of annihilating egoism
author: Paul Brunton

text: I suddenly saw that all the time it was not I who had been seeking God, but God who had been seeking me. I had made myself the centre of my own existence and had my back turned to God
author: Bede Griffiths

text: A single ego is an absurdly narrow vantage point from which to view the world
author: Aleister Crowley

text: At least when one speaks of oneself one is passionate, well-informed and specific
author: Jan Neruda

text: The ego-self constantly pushes reality away. It constructs a future out of empty expectations and a past out of regretful memories
author: Alan W. Watts

text: Being a heterosexual woman who loved men meant being a translator for their emotions, a palliative nurse for their pride and a hostage negotiator for their egos
author: Dolly Alderton

text: the most common cause of death among alpha males was ego
author: Nelson Demille

text: Love and ego can never exist together, just as the Sun and shadow cannot
author: Banani Ray

text: Power is crack cocaine for your ego and battery acid for your soul
author: David Mitchell

text: Every autobiography is concerned with two characters, a Don Quixote, the Ego, and a Sancho Panza, the Self
author: W.H. Auden
